ai-patthana10.3:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means pervading the three watches of the night.
ai-patthana10.3:0.3_0: knives associated with wholesome things, and so on,
ai-patthana10.3:3.1_0: not skilled in teaching or training.
ai-patthana10.3:5.1_0: Not for the sake of another, or for the sake of a trifling material possessions,
ai-patthana10.3:5.1_1: Not for the sake of a unskillful and not for the sake of livelihood. ...
ai-patthana10.3:5.1_2: Not for the sake of another, or for the sake of a skillful teaching.
ai-patthana10.3:5.1_3: Not for the sake of profitable root or for the sake of a triple,
ai-patthana10.3:5.1_4: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana10.3:7.1_0: It’s not easy to give a teaching to someone without a cause or reason.
ai-patthana10.3:8.1_0: It’s not easy to give a teaching.
